title: TN_SC_WRITE Function Module
description:
TN_SC_WRITE passes the text Ist_STRING at the coordinates 

Iin_Y, Iin_Y and the color of Iby_ATTR.

Is specifed color code = 0, then the string is displayed without change the 

existing old color information at he respective character positions.

192 Version 1.21

Chapter 11. Telnet-Vision
name: TN_SC_WRITE

input.name: Xus_TN_SCREEN
input.description: Screen structure where the text will be written
